bibl.title: The Ptolemaic dikasterion; - Joseph Modrzejewski (Mélèze Modrzejewski), Dikasteria: A Panhellenic Project? A Response to Nadine Grotkamp.
Symposion 2013. Papers on Greek and Hellenistic Legal History (Cambidge MA, August 26-29, 2013). Vorträge zur griechischen und hellenistischen Rechtsgeschichte (Cambridge MA, 26.-29. August 2013)

bibl.note: The issues addressed in the response are dealt with in a broader approach in a contribution to the proceedings of the 27th International Congress of Papyrology held in Warsaw in 2013: Joseph Modrzejewski (Mélèze Modrzejewski), Modèles classiques des lois ptolémaïques (forthcoming).
bibl.seg: Nadine Grotkamp, The Ptolemaic dikasterion; - Joseph Modrzejewski (Mélèze Modrzejewski), Dikasteria: A Panhellenic Project? A Response to Nadine Grotkamp.

Michael Gagarin & Adriaan Lanni (edd.), Symposion 2013. Papers on Greek and Hellenistic Legal History (Cambidge MA, August 26-29, 2013). Vorträge zur griechischen und hellenistischen Rechtsgeschichte (Cambridge MA, 26.-29. August 2013) = Akten der Gesellschaft für griechische und hellenistische Rechtsgeschichte. 24 = Österreichische Akademie der Wissenschaften. Philosophisch-historische Klasse. Documenta antiqua - Antike Rechtsgeschichte (Wien, 2014) pp. 347-360; - 361-364.

The issues addressed in the response are dealt with in a broader approach in a contribution to the proceedings of the 27th International Congress of Papyrology held in Warsaw in 2013: Joseph Modrzejewski (Mélèze Modrzejewski), Modèles classiques des lois ptolémaïques (forthcoming).
